document.full_text: gilead sciences inc said on wednesday that its experimental hiv drug elvitegravir proved as effective as a drug made by merck & co in a late-stage clinical trial.
document.title: gilead hiv drug as effective as merck's in trial
lines_and_colors: gilead sciences inc said on wednesday that its experimental hiv drug elvitegravir proved as effective as a drug made by merck & co in a late-stage clinical trial.
